mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(username, password, email, phone, real_name, create_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{realName}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, real_name = #{realName}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE user SET password = #{newPassword}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as totalBills, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN bt.name = '收入' THEN b.price ELSE 0 END), 0) as totalIncome, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN bt.name != '收入' THEN b.price ELSE 0 END), 0) as totalExpense FROM bill b LEFT JOIN bill_type bt ON b.type_id = bt.id
